description.en: A young boy who grew up living a rather uneventful life in a highly advanced civilization known as Cocoon. Caught up in the Purge、 he loses his mother before his very eyes and soon after ends up being branded a Pulse l'Cie─a threat to society. Hope learns to face his problems through the hardships he endures while fighting alongside his friends.
description.jp:
高度な機械文明の世界コクーンで 平凡
に暮らしてきた少年。
市民追放政策に巻き込まれ 目の前で母
親を失う結果となり さらに世界の敵と
される「下界のルシ」とされ追われる身
に。ライトニングらと共に戦う中で 多
くのものを乗り越え成長する。

jp.text: できるできないの\n問題じゃないです
ついてきてよかったです\nひとりだったら怖がるだけでした
あんたが死んだら償えないだろ！
できたら僕も……守れたらって
次はちょっとだけ 甘えます……
間違うこともあるかもしれない\nそれでも 自分で納得して\n決めたことなら後悔はしません

gl.text: It's not a question of can or can't.
You want to die? You can't! I won't let you!
I'll try to watch out for you、 too.
I'll ask for help earlier next time around.
I might not make all the right choices. But as long as I'm the one who decided what to do、 there's nothing to regret.

name.jp: コールアビリティ_ホープ

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Shell 【C】]
• Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• [MAG Damage Resist] duration +3
• Special Effect duration +3
rank_up_desc.jp:
「シェル【C】」使用時
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限はそれぞれの最大BRVの120％分
・「魔法ダメージ軽減」の3ACTION期間延長
・使用後特殊効果の3ACTION期間延長

name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_ホープ

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Purification (C)]
• Becomes 5-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice
• Increases total BRV potency by 120%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Increases party's BRV by 20% of total HP damage dealt
• [Deshell] duration +2
rank_up_desc.jp:
「鎧袖一触【C】」使用時
・8HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　5HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行う
　に変化し合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・与えた合計HPダメージに依存した量のBRVを味方全員に加算
・「弱心」の2ACTION期間延長

desc.en:
4-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + HP attack
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Deals 100% HP damage to all targets
Recovers party's HP by 50% of HP damage dealt (limit 20% of Max HP)

When [Bearer of Hope] is active:
• Raises Max BRV by 40%
• Raises Attack by 20/30/40/50/60% based on level
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 10/15/20/25/30% based on level
desc.gl:
4-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals total HP damage to each target
Moderately restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 20% of individual MAX HP
While special effect Entrusted Hope at least 1:
 • Moderately raises own MAX BRV
 • Raises ATK, amount stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV; increases with special effect Entrusted Hope level
Special effect Entrusted Hope level changes with party's buff total (limit 5)

自身の最大BRV中アップし

自身の攻撃力と奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて

[Shell] use +1

• Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 90%

• Lowers Action Delay by 26
• Does not increase turn count
• Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]

　∟ Increases allies' BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt

Shell use +1

name.jp: 苛烈なる制裁＆天罰プラス

desc.en:
When [Bearer of Hope] is active:
•  [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [Brutal Sanction]
　∟ 4-HIT AoE magic BRV attack (40% per hit)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 70% of Attack
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] become [Retributive Blast]
　∟ 4-HIT magic BRV + HP attack (80% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
　∟ Target: 4 turns 40% [DEF Down] when breaking target or attacking broken target
desc.gl: When special effect Entrusted Hope at least 1:\n • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes Brutal Sanction (4-hit group magic BRV attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; grants party BRV based on own ATK)\n • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes Retributive Blast (4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 20% HP damage to non-targets; inflicts 4 turns DEF Down II on target when inflicting Break on target or attacking target afflicted with Break)
desc.jp:
特殊効果「託された希望」1以上の時
・通常「BRV攻撃」「BRV攻撃＋」が以下の
　「苛烈なる制裁」に変化
　-4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃に変化
　-攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
　-味方全員に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
・通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が以下の「天罰」に変化
　-4HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-ターゲット以外にも20％分のHPダメージ
　-ターゲットブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時
　　ターゲットに4ACTION「防御力中ダウン」付与

short_desc.gl: Brutal Sanction & Retributive Blast Plus: Enables Brutal Sanction, Retributive Blast while special effect Entrusted Hope at least 1
short_desc.jp: 苛烈なる制裁＆天罰プラス：特殊効果「託された希望」1以上の時「苛烈なる制裁」「天罰」に変化
